altername_name: Des Chiffres et des Lettres: l'Entrainement Cerebral Maximum!
name: De5 Ch1ffr3s et de5 L3ttres: L'Entrainement Cérébral Maximum!
overview: The DS welcomes Laurent Romejko, Bertrand Renard and Arielle Boulin-Prat in this adaptation of the TV show Numbers and Letters. Throw yourself into this cerebral entertainment against a virtual opponent or a friend and grind your neurons to get out the most complicated words of the French language and the most elaborate calculations possible.
